Text: Spiral (Polish: "Spirala" ) is a 1978 Polish drama film directed by Krzysztof Zanussi which tells the story of a stranger who turns up at a resort hotel in midwinter, behaves rudely towards other guests and disappears the next day.

Text: Spiral (1978 film):  Found half-frozen in the snow he is taken to hospital where his story is gradually revealed.
